column5: 4 spacious bedrooms, 3.5 baths, 2 living areas, master w/Jacuzzi, upstairs media / game room, backyard patio w/table, grill, and tree shade. Home is in a quiet neighborhood. 15 minutes from Houston and less than 1 mile from HEB, Walmart, Kroger, Target, restaurants, and shopping. 10min from Bush International Airport and easy drive to downtown, NRG, Galleria, and more.
